title: Understanding Cluster A
text: Cluster A personality disorders are characterized by odd or eccentric behaviors. They are distinct from other clusters which may involve dramatic, emotional, or anxious behaviors.

title: Identifying Cluster A Disorders
text: Cluster A includes disorders that often involve social awkwardness and distorted thinking. Think about disorders that might make someone seem peculiar or detached.

hintAnswer: paranoid personality disorder, schizoid personality disorder, and schizotypal personality disorder
title: List of Cluster A Disorders
text: Which disorders are included in Cluster A?
choices: paranoid personality disorder, schizoid personality disorder, and schizotypal personality disorder
antisocial, borderline, histrionic, and narcissistic personality disorders
